snippet.title: PowerWash Simulator Back to the Future Special Pack Announcement
snippet.description:
Great Scott! Back to the Future is coming to PowerWash Simulator! 
We'd love to reveal more but we don't want to disrupt the space-time continuum. 💦 

PowerWash Sim is available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series S|X, Xbox One, Windows, and Steam. Plus, it is included with Xbox Game Pass!  

 Play PowerWash Simulator on Steam here: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1290000 
 
For more pressure washing goodness, subscribe to our channel! 

Follow our Twitter for daily satisfying content: https://bit.ly/TwitterPWS 

Join our Discord to join the conversation: https://discord.gg/powerwashsimulator 

Follow us on TikTok for quick spray socials: https://bit.ly/PWSTikTok 
 
#PowerWashSimulator #BacktotheFuture #Gaming
